name: Evil Snowball (2008)
description:
Just think 2D seasonal "Run Sack Boy Run", release in Flash over a decade ago (2008).

There are 6 levels of increasing difficulty where you are chased by a giant killer snowball. This was released on Kongregate and it flopped hard. But I loved the idea and enjoyed making the graphics. Also all proper AS3 OOP! More or less.

level 2 is a bit of a sticky wicket, but the rest are solid enough (If I remember correctly - was just playing it and can't beat level 2...) It is a little buggy, but hey it's a free game.

Oh, and the music is a bit obnoxious. you might want to hit that mute button before long. Sorry.
